page.title: 18Saturday at Home
page.content: On Saturday mornings I get up at 6.00am and switch on my television.I then have breakfast which is usually Sugar Puffs,toast and tea.Then l watch more television and then get up and get dressed.I sometimes go out and play football while Mum does the housework.Later I have to make my bed and do my pocket money job,which is to take the dog for a walk. After lunch,which is often salad,I sometimes go out on my bike to visit a friend.BMX bikes are very popular at the moment and people try to do stunts on their bikes with out falling off.I sometimes have tea at my friend's house.My Saturday ends as it starts,in front of the television.
